00021 #ifndef XAPIAN_INCLUDED_SORTER_H
00022 #define XAPIAN_INCLUDED_SORTER_H
00023 
00024 #include <string>
00025 #include <vector>
00026 
00027 #include <xapian/document.h>
00028 #include <xapian/visibility.h>
00029 
00030 namespace Xapian {
00031 
00033 class XAPIAN_VISIBILITY_DEFAULT Sorter {
00034   public:
00039     virtual std::string operator()(const Xapian::Document & doc) const = 0;
00040 
00042     virtual ~Sorter();
00043 };
00044 
00051 class XAPIAN_VISIBILITY_DEFAULT MultiValueSorter : public Sorter {
00052     std::vector<std::pair<Xapian::valueno, bool> > valnos;
00053 
00054   public:
00055     MultiValueSorter() { }
00056 
00057     template <class Iterator>
00058     MultiValueSorter(Iterator begin, Iterator end) {
00059         while (begin != end) add(*begin++);
00060     }
00061 
00062     virtual std::string operator()(const Xapian::Document & doc) const;
00063 
00064     void add(Xapian::valueno valno, bool forward = true) {
00065         valnos.push_back(std::make_pair(valno, forward));
00066     }
00067 
00068     virtual ~MultiValueSorter();
00069 };
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 #endif // XAPIAN_INCLUDED_SORTER_H
